## MapView.loadPostEffects() method

Loads a post effects definition file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadPostEffects(postEffectsFile: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  postEffectsFile | string | File URL describing the post effects. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
